left.sql: SELECT ALLOCATION_ID, ALLOCATION_TRADE_ID, SECURITY_ID, PORTFOLIO_CD, SUBSTRATEGY, CURRENCY_CD, SHARES, EZE_PORTFOLIO_ID, EXECUTION_BROKER_ID, TRADE_DATE, SETTLE_DATE FROM CustomApp.dbo.FACT_ALLOCATION_ARCH_VW ARCH_VW WHERE ARCH_VW.TRADE_DATE BETWEEN convert(date, '20170831') AND convert(date, '20170901')

right.sql: SELECT ALLOCATION_ID, ALLOCATION_TRADE_ID, SECURITY_ID, PORTFOLIO_CD, SUBSTRATEGY, CURRENCY_CD, SHARES, EZE_PORTFOLIO_ID, EXECUTION_BROKER_ID, TRADE_DATE, SETTLE_DATE FROM CustomApp.dbo.FACT_ALLOCATIONS WHERE TRADE_DATE BETWEEN convert(date, '20170831') AND convert(date, '20170901')
